component.text: End of service providers communication facility
Roll over the Layer 1 WAN standards for more information.
<li>Allows signal speeds of up to 64 Kbps on a 25 pin D connector over short distances<li>Formerly known as RS-232<li>Same as ITU-T V.24 specification
<li>Faster (up to 2 Mbps) version of EIA/TIA-232<li>Uses a 36 pin D connector and is capable of longer cable runs<li>Also known as RS-422 and RS-423
<li>Provides access to services of up to 52 Mbps on a 60 pin D connector
<li>An ITU-T standard for synchronous communications between a network access device and a packet network at speeds up to 48 Kbps<li>Uses a 34 pin rectangular connector
<li>An ITU-T standard for synchronous digital communications<li>Uses a 15 pin D connector
